mapper.select: select NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, NICK, REGDATE from MEMBER where MEMBER_ID=#{memberid}
mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER(NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, NICK, REGDATE) values (SEQ_MEMBER.nextval, #{memberid}, #{memberpw}, #{nick}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update MEMBER set MEMBER_PW=#{memberpw} where MEMBER_ID=#{memberid}
update MEMBER set MEMBER_PW=#{pw} where MEMBER_ID=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from MEMBER where MEMBER_ID=#{memberid} and MEMBER_PW=#{memberpw}
